title: Does Rep. Clyburn Want To Make ‘Lift Every Voice and Sing’ a National Hymn?
subtitle: The song — long considered the Black national anthem — could gain official prominence.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In January 2021, Rep. James Clyburn is introducing a proposal in the House of Representatives to make ‘Lift Every Voice and Sing’ a national hymn, putting it on equal standing with the national anthem.
